data.name: Planetary Exploration Company
data.detailed_description:
You are the leader of a Space Exploration Company, your job is to explore planets and destroy all the alien hives.

The combat is a mix of Vampire Survivors and bullet-hell shmups.

When you explore the planet you can find proceduraly generated maps, creatures, minerals, vegetables and artifacts. Then you have to use the right tools to extract resources from them.

You can create and upgrade tools for your employees, combine resources, research new technologies and upgrade your transport robot with new rooms that give you new abilities.
data.about_the_game:
You are the leader of a Space Exploration Company, your job is to explore planets and destroy all the alien hives.

The combat is a mix of Vampire Survivors and bullet-hell shmups.

When you explore the planet you can find proceduraly generated maps, creatures, minerals, vegetables and artifacts. Then you have to use the right tools to extract resources from them.

You can create and upgrade tools for your employees, combine resources, research new technologies and upgrade your transport robot with new rooms that give you new abilities.
data.short_description: Fight aliens as you explore planets, collect resources to build tools and items, while you manage your company and try to survive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 minimum resolution, recommended dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of RAM
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
